---
title: "`r params$title`"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  title: 'dev'
  script: 'dev'
  strace: FALSE
  renv: FALSE
format:
  html:
    embed-resources: true
---

```{r, include=FALSE}

script <- params$script
if ( script == "dev") script <- log_example("prg1.R")

root <- gsub(pattern = "^.+/|\\.R$", replacement = "", x = script)

# Create clean R session

p <- callr::r_session$new()

# Attach strace to the process of the new session

if (params$strace == "yes") {
  sprintf("strace -ttt -T -e trace=openat,unlink,unlinkat,chdir -o %s -p %s",
        paste0(root, ".strace"),
        p$get_pid()) |>
    print() |>
  system(wait = FALSE)
}

# Render script to md
child <- p$run(
  func = whirl::quarto_render_move,
  args = list(
    input = whirl::log_document("dummy.qmd"),
    execute_params = list(script = script),
    output_format = "md",
    output_file = paste0(root, ".md")
  ),
  package = TRUE
)

# Cleanup

p$finalize()
p$close()
```
